Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • Tanks.App
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants
    public class App
extends processing.core.PApplet
    The main class representing the Tanks game application.

    • Method Detail

      • settings

        public void settings()
        Set the size of the App
        Overrides:
        settings in class processing.core.PApplet

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Setup the application. Includes all initial setting variables, soundeffects, FPS, and most importantly level rendering.
        Overrides:
        setup in class processing.core.PApplet
        Since:
        1.0

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel()
        Loads the level configuration and initializes necessary components for the level. This method loads the level configuration from a JSON file, initializes powerups, sets up the graphical user interface, loads images, and sets up the level renderer.

      • getGUI

        public static GUI getGUI()
        Retrieves the GUI instance. This method returns the GUI instance used in the application.
        Returns:
        The GUI instance.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed​(processing.event.KeyEvent event)
        Handles key pressed events. This method handles key pressed events and performs corresponding actions such as moving tanks, adjusting turret angles, shooting, repairing tanks, adding fuel, or advancing to the next level.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class processing.core.PApplet
        Parameters:
        event - The key event object.
        Since:
        1.0

      • nextTank

        public void nextTank()
        Advances to the next tank's turn. This method selects the next tank.

      • checkTanksRemaining

        public void checkTanksRemaining()
        Checks the remaining tanks in the level. This method checks the number of remaining tanks in the level and triggers actions accordingly, such as advancing to the next level.

      • nextLevel

        public void nextLevel()
        Advances to the next level. This method advances to the next level, resets tanks, reloads the level configuration, and updates game state if all tanks are destroyed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there are no more levels, initialising gameover.

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased()
        Handles key released events. This method handles key released events, particularly for stopping tank movement sounds.
        Overrides:
        keyReleased in class processing.core.PApplet
        Since:
        1.0

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws the game elements on the screen. This method renders the game elements, including tanks, projectiles, GUI elements, and background.
        Overrides:
        draw in class processing.core.PApplet
        Since:
        1.0

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to start the application. This method is the entry point of the application and starts the PApplet.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments.
        Since:
        1.0
